name: 陳文章
objective: 本課程內容包括熱量傳送操作及其應用。
schedule:
1.導管之不可壓縮流動(Incompressible flow in Pipe and Channel)
2.流體流經沉浸物體(Flow Past Immersed Objects)
3.流體輸送與計量(Transportation and Metering of Fluids)
4.動量輸送原理(Fundamentals of Momentum Transfer)
5.熱傳導(Heat Transfer by Conduction)
6.熱流原理(Principles of Heat Flow in Fluids)
materials:
1. McCabe, W. L., Smith, J. C. & Harriott, P., “Unit Operations of Chemical Engineering”, 7th edition, 2005, 東華書局
2. 林俊一，輸送現象，2004，全威圖書公司
